SELECT g.id, g.name, g.code, g.brand_name, g.price, g.number, g.img, g.banner, g.remark, g.spec_remark, g.create_id, g.update_id, g.create_time, g.update_time, m.merchant_name as seller_id, s.shop_name AS shop_id, gt.name AS goods_type
from inno72_goods g LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m on m.id=g.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods_type gt ON gt.code=g.goods_type WHERE g.is_delete=0 and ( g.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or g.code LIKE '%${keyword}%' ) and g.seller_id = #{code} ORDER BY g.update_time DESC

SELECT g.id, g.name, g.code, g.brand_name, g.price, g.number, g.img, g.banner, g.remark, g.spec_remark, g.seller_id, g.shop_id, g.create_id, g.update_id, g.create_time, g.update_time, m.merchant_name, s.shop_name, CONCAT(IFNULL( gt.parent_name,''), '-', IFNULL( gt.name,'') ) AS goods_type, gt.code AS goods_type_code, gt.parent_code AS goods_type_parent_code
from inno72_goods g LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m on m.id=g.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods_type gt ON gt.code=g.goods_type WHERE g.is_delete=0 and g.id = #{id}
SELECT g.* from inno72_goods g WHERE g.is_delete=0 AND g.id NOT IN ( SELECT g.goods_id FROM inno72_interact_goods g ) and g.shop_id = #{shopId}
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_supply_channel_goods where goods_id=#{id}

SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_goods g LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_goods pg ON pg.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan p ON p.id = pg.activity_plan_id WHERE p.is_delete=0 and goods_id=#{id} and NOW() <= p.end_time
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_goods g where g.is_delete = 0 and g.code =#{code}
